hotels.title: Spanish-Inspired Palm Springs Retreat with Championship Golf Course, Water Park & Day Spa
hotels.description: Occupying a prime position in the heart of California's Palm Springs, this five-star oasis offers both excitement and tranquility. Enjoy a refreshing retreat within this stunning lakeside resort, taking time off to float in the vast variety of sparkling pools or at the onsite Splashtopia Water Park, take a swing at the championship golf course, and recharge at the rejuvenating day spa. Savour Californian cuisine at the onsite BluEmber restaurant, enjoy casual bites and tropical cocktails at Conchilla Valley Pool Bar & Grill or sip on a refreshing drink at the R Bar. Just a short drive away, explore the vibrant El Paseo Shopping District, known for its high-end boutiques and art galleries, or for the adventurous, take a trip out to the Palm Springs Aerial Tramway or Joshua Tree National Park.
